name: Make WP Responsive Table
author: Nguyen Quoc Hung

sections.description:
Make WP Responsive Table is a lightweight WordPress plugin that enables responsive tables on your website. It allows you to convert existing unresponsive tables into responsive tables without the need for complex coding or additional plugins.

License

This plugin is released under the GPL-2.0-or-later license. For more details, see the license file.

Contact

For any questions or support, please contact nguyenquochung082@gmail.com.

Donate

If you find this plugin helpful and would like to support its development, you can donate via [PayPal] https://www.paypal.com to nguyenquochung082@gmail.com.

Your contribution is greatly appreciated!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the make-wp-responsive-table folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
